column5: This quaint historic home is 4 blocks south of Texas A&M campus. Wood floors throughout house. The Howdy Room is roomy with a queen-size bed and is one of 3 bedrooms available or rent all three together (see separate listing of Just Blocks from Texas A&M or under individual rooms--Howdy Rm, Gig 'em Rm, Reveille Rm).  One shared bathroom.
column8: Howdy Bdrm few blocks from TexasA&M
